attributes.action: Remove Covid vaccine requirement for travel to Pakistan
attributes.additional_details: There are millions who are vaccinated and millions who are not, not everyone is against the vaccine, however people have other health issues or problems which are stopping them from getting vaccinated and not everyone can obtain an exemption certificate. Pakistan needs to remove this law it is stopping people from meeting elderly family members and loved ones. Put other measures in place but remove the mandatory covid vaccine law, it’s time to move on and let people enjoy life.
attributes.background: Put pressure on the Pakistani government to remove the covid vaccine requirement for adults over the age of 12. If a country like Saudi which sees travellers from around the world in their millions have removed it why doesn’t Pakistan? It is stopping people with health issues meeting loved ones

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the Government of Pakistan.
